channel.title: What else is related to NPC Attacking?
channel.description:
Because i've changed the delays etc.. I tryed my attacknpc method on another source and it works fine no massing etc, but on my normal source you can mass with it.
so what else affects NPC Attacking?

item.title: What else is related to NPC Attacking?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

When he attacks an npc the timers are not working, thats what he means. Like he would put it for lets say 2 seconds every attack to hit the NPC, it would hit every 1 second.

Npchandler.java affects npcs as well.

Read full topic
item.source: What else is related to NPC Attacking?

item.title: What else is related to NPC Attacking?
item.dc:creator: @Tenacious_T Tenacious T
item.description:
@Tenacious_T wrote:

R u talking about like, what triggers their attack as in like, if u just walked up to them, they automatically attack u?

Read full topic

item.title: What else is related to NPC Attacking?
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:4, topic:161442”][quote author=Stanyer link=topic=219731.msg1905015#msg1905015 date=1196366430]

what do u mean by

what else affects NPC attacking

Like im not understanding the ?
(make a lil more clear?)

How can i explain that more -.-

What else affects npc attacking other than the attacknpc method
[/quote]

Enemies hp. Make sure there is no bugs… Cause there is a bug where you mage a npc, and then when you go to different area/logout, the npc automatically dies, then they go back and loot. lul[/quote]

It’s not that.

I want to just know what other methods affect NPC Attack timings etc.

Read full topic
